_sText:
**Author:** _Mirevin_
**Creator:** _Mirevin_

Following the advice of users, I improved the map.

In the opinion of the members added light.
**I Added::**
- The possibility of entry of terrorists on the roof
- I added a flash, smoke grenades and nightvishion!
- Helicopter
- Increasing the city
- More props
- Lights

I think now the map will appeal to users.
